title: Corporate Risk Identification Methods Through News Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and ability to understand social issues
context.additional_context: Conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, enabling learners with professional backgrounds (medical/legal/technical) to acquire risk analysis techniques applicable to social studies contexts

learning_goals: Learners can classify three or more types of corporate risks (financial, operational, reputational) through news article analysis
Learners can identify risk signals in news data with 80% accuracy using simple text analysis tools
Learners can propose two or more corporate response strategies based on identified risk types

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
